nodes.text: The Monarchomechs were an organization of cyborgs that existed about 400 years before the Battle of Yavin.

A group operating in the eastern Expansion Region of the galaxy, the Monarchomechs opposed their local Monarchy, killing many of their rulers. The group was made up of technology-encased organic brains, similar to Tatooine's B'omarr monks. The name "Monarchomech" is derived from the Middle Yutanese phrase for "killer of monarchs", reflecting their violent ways.
